General.Name: Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells information access equipment in China and internationally. The company provides IPRAN terminal devices; RF passive components, such as power splitters, directional and hybrid couplers, coaxial terminations, attenuators, filters, combiners, diplexers, and POI products; and triple play products, such as EOC master and slave products. It also offers enterprise gateway solutions comprising PON and LAN access gateway, and IPPBX; PON series products, such as GPON and EPON; and PON aggregation extensions. The company serves mobile, Unicom, telecom, cable operators, governments, and enterprises, etc. Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 259, Internet of Things Street, Hangzhou, China, 310051
